api_data.job_title: URGENT HIRING  FOR TOURS AND TRAVEL COMPANY FOR PRODUCT AND CONTRACTING

jd_information.description: TALENT HUNTERS ARE HIRING FOR TOURS AND TRAVEL COMPANY* Preferred From Tours and Travel Only*DEPARTMENT: PRODUCT AND CONTRACTING ( INTERNATIONAL & DOMESTIC ) OPENING IN BOTH DEPARTEMENTBASIC REQUIREMENT: · Target domestic corporate selling and marketing major events like Meetings, Incentives, Conference and Exhibition MICE· Must have Knowledge inDestination· Must have Knowledge inCOSTING,NEGOTIATING AND CONTRACTINGrates with SUPPLIERS· Discuss clients’ requirements and provide advice on worldwide destinations, tours, accommodation and flights by understanding the clients’ interest and purpose of visit.· Designed attractive travelITINERARIESfor clients· Good knowledge ofTOURSIM MARKETINGtechnique to encourage destination travel· Excellent Social and Interpersonal Skills with pleasant Personality· Proficiency in Microsoft WORD, EXCEL AND POWERPOINT.· Ability to manageTRAVEL PLANSandORGANISEtask systematic effective ADMINISTRATION and MANAGERIAL skills.· Conductingresearchaccording to the requirements of the client.Regards,Pinky 9867311024
